description:
Network A/V in OBS Studio with NewTek's NDI technology.

#### Features

- NDI Source : receive NDI video and audio in OBS
- NDI Output : transmit video and audio from OBS to NDI
- NDI Filter (a.k.a NDI Dedicated Output) : transmit a single source or scene to NDI
displayName: NewTek NDI integration for OBS Studio
summary: NewTek NDI integration for OBS Studio
author: Stéphane Lepin
